adjective.description: Not physically moved from a place or position; not taken away, lifted off, or displaced.
Of a quality, condition, etc., especially one that is harmful or undesirable: not eliminated, done away with, or got rid of; not stopped, cancelled, or alleviated.
Chiefly poetic. Fixed in place; firmly grounded or stationed. Now rare.

origin: Late Middle English. From un- + remove + -ed. Compare removed.
